name: Girlfriend <-> Assassin
description:
Single-player dating murder game with the focus of keeping your date in the dark while hunting down targets within the restaurant. Can you balance a double life of being both a hired killer and a date at the same time? 

Credits: 

Kevin McCue - Programmer, Script Writer

Logan Cooper - Artist, QA

Benjamin Dameworth - Programmer

James Fogleman - Artist, SFX

Josh Dameworth - Music

Damian Sheehy - Programmer
